title: Amazon introduces its next gen AI chip, intensifying rivalry with Microsoft and Google
description: Digital Governance in 50+ issues, 500+ actors, 5+ processes
date: Digital Governance in 50+ issues, 500+ actors, 5+ processes

title: ChatGPT: A year in review
description: Within a mere two months of its launch, ChatGPT amassed 100 million monthly users. Fast forward a year, and the user base has now surged to an impressive 200 million. This remarkable growth not only surprised major tech firms but also policymakers. Delve into trends that have shaped both industries and regulatory frameworks.
date: Within a mere two months of its launch, ChatGPT amassed 100 million monthly users. Fast forward a year, and the user base has now surged to an impressive 200 million. This remarkable growth not only surprised major tech firms but also policymakers. Delve into trends that have shaped both industries and regulatory frameworks.

title: EU digital identity wallet to be piloted in Luxembourg amongst other states
description: Luxembourg joins other European countries in the digital identity wallet pilot programme.
date: Luxembourg joins other European countries in the digital identity wallet pilot programme.

title: The US is experiencing an overall decline in demand for legacy news media
description: Research shows a steady decline, for the most part, in the consumption of news in the US.
date: Research shows a steady decline, for the most part, in the consumption of news in the US.

title: Michigan to introduce legislation combatting deceptive uses of AI in political advertising
description: The state is set to pass legislation requiring campaigns to disclose the use of AI in their ads and prohibit AI-generated deepfakes without transparent disclosure. Concerns are rising that AI deepfakes could mislead voters in the 2024 elections.
date: The state is set to pass legislation requiring campaigns to disclose the use of AI in their ads and prohibit AI-generated deepfakes without transparent disclosure. Concerns are rising that AI deepfakes could mislead voters in the 2024 elections.

title: UNESCO celebrates the 13th anniversary of media information literacy in Albania
description: Youths in Albania join UNESCO to celebrate MIL’s 13th anniversary with simulation exercises, discussions and a competition.
date: Youths in Albania join UNESCO to celebrate MIL’s 13th anniversary with simulation exercises, discussions and a competition.

title: Czech Chamber of Deputies approves digital ID cards for mobile use
description: Set to launch in 2024, the voluntary digital IDs won’t replace physical cards and are limited to domestic use.
date: Set to launch in 2024, the voluntary digital IDs won’t replace physical cards and are limited to domestic use.

title: Finland’s strategy to lead the metaverse Industry by 2035
description: Finland’s strategy towards metaverse leadership is grounded in collaboration, inclusivity, and a diverse ecosystem. It sets practical objectives, emphasising ethical considerations and specific sectoral applications rather than hyped expectations.
date: Finland’s strategy towards metaverse leadership is grounded in collaboration, inclusivity, and a diverse ecosystem. It sets practical objectives, emphasising ethical considerations and specific sectoral applications rather than hyped expectations.

title: Google’s DeepMind achieves breakthrough in AI social learning
description: Researchers from Google’s DeepMind have demonstrated that AI can acquire skills through a form of social learning similar to humans and animals. The study highlights the potential for cultural evolution to contribute to the birth of AGI, and calls for further interdisciplinary research in the field.
date: Researchers from Google’s DeepMind have demonstrated that AI can acquire skills through a form of social learning similar to humans and animals. The study highlights the potential for cultural evolution to contribute to the birth of AGI, and calls for further interdisciplinary research in the field.

title: Amazon’s Q, a versatile AI-powered chatbot
description: Amazon has unveiled an AI-powered chatbot called Q for its AWS customers. This versatile chatbot is seen as a comprehensive solution for business intelligence and programming use cases.
date: Amazon has unveiled an AI-powered chatbot called Q for its AWS customers. This versatile chatbot is seen as a comprehensive solution for business intelligence and programming use cases.
